biotools.summary: Coronapp is a web application to annotate and monitor SARS-CoV-2 mutations. It is able to easily proces user‐provided SARS‐CoV‐2 genomic sequences and visualizing the current worldwide status of SARS‐CoV‐2 mutations. The webtool allows users to highlight mutations and categorize them by frequency, country, genomic location and effect on protein sequences, and to monitor their presence in the population over time.
